scripts.migrate:up: docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec backend npm run migrate:up
scripts.migrate:down: docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec backend npm run migrate:down
scripts.install:backend: docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec backend npm ci
scripts.install:frontend: docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec frontend npm ci
scripts.check:backend: cd backend && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.check:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.check: npm run check:backend && npm run check:frontend
scripts.init-suggesting: docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml cp ./backend/init-users.sql database:/tmp/init-users.sql && docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml cp ./backend/init-test-data.sql database:/tmp/init-test-data.sql && docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec database psql -U postgres -d toska_book_club -f /tmp/init-users.sql && docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec database psql -U postgres -d toska_book_club -f /tmp/init-test-data.sql
scripts.init-voting: docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml cp ./backend/init-users.sql database:/tmp/init-users.sql && docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml cp ./backend/init-voting-phase.sql database:/tmp/init-voting-phase.sql && docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec database psql -U postgres -d toska_book_club -f /tmp/init-users.sql && docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec database psql -U postgres -d toska_book_club -f /tmp/init-voting-phase.sql
scripts.init-results: docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml cp ./backend/init-users.sql database:/tmp/init-users.sql && docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml cp ./backend/init-results-phase.sql database:/tmp/init-results-phase.sql && docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec database psql -U postgres -d toska_book_club -f /tmp/init-users.sql && docker compose -f docker compose.dev.yml exec database psql -U postgres -d toska_book_club -f /tmp/init-results-phase.sql
